div.p: From Charles French to Julius Haast
MS papers 37, folder 65, Alexander Turnbull Library, Wellington.

To proof.
You will be sorry to hear that Dr Mueller is no longer director of the Botanic Gardens here. His successor has not yet been appointed.

I may mention that regarding Dr Mueller's removal, that for some time the Public has been dissatisfied with his administration and after some very hard fighting the Parliament has thought proper to transfer him to the University with the appointment of Govt Botanist & a Salary of ¢300 per annum (without quarters) and an additional sum of £300 for purchase of specimens & Amanuensis
These were not the terms on which M's employment was continued. —
